long_description: The Harmony 303 Hull protectant spray helps prevent damage to boats, PFD's and accessories from harmful UV rays. Protects against fading and and wear and restores natural color to many polyethylene, Royalex, rubber, vinyl, fiberglass and synthetic products. Not oily or greasy and does not attract dust. To apply Harmony 303 Hull protectant, just spray on and wipe off.
short_description: The Harmony 303 Hull protectant spray helps prevent damage to boats, PFD's and accessories from harmful UV rays.
